content: longing for spring socks by caoua coffee materials 350 yards/320 m 380 yards/350 m solid or semisolid fingering weight sample barking dog yarns achilles 80% merino 20%nylon needles us1 / 2 25 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle size women s medium large gauge 32 sts / 46 row= 4 inches in stockinette abbreviations k = knit stitch k2tog = knit 2 together kfb = knit into front and back of the same stitch 1st increased m1r = make 1 to the right by inserting left needle back to front into the horizontal strand between last worked st and the next one then knit that loop you just created m1l = make 1 to the left by inserting left needle front to back into the horizontal strand between last worked st and the next one then knit that loop you just created through the back loop p = purl stitch pfb = purl into front and back of the same stitch thus increasing by one rs = right side / public side sl yb = slip_stitch as if to purl with yarn in back back = the side away from you sl yf = slip_stitch as if to purl with yarn in front front = the side closest to you ssk = slip 1 knit wise slip 1 purl wise knit both stitches together through the back loops sl2kpsso = centered double decrease slip 2 sts together knitwise knit the next stitch then pass the 2 slipped stitches over the knitted stitch and off the needles st s = stitch es ws = wrong side / private side w&t = wrap and turn if knit side of the work is facing you slip 1 stitch as if to purl with yarn in back = the side away from you bring working yarn to front = the side closest to you between the 2 needles slip_stitch back onto left needle turn your work if purl side of the work is facing you slip 1 stitch as if to purl with yarn in front = the side closest to you bring working yarn to back = the side away from you between the 2 needles slip_stitch back onto left needle turn your work yo = yarn over ©caoua coffee 2015 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved longing for spring v 2 page 1/6 longing for spring socks - by caoua coffee pattern toe cast on 24 sts using judy s magic cast on see knitty com spring 06 or any other invisible co you like divide sts as follows instep needle s 12 sts sole needle s 12 sts toe increases round 1 instep kfb k to 2 sts before end of instep kfb k1 sole kfb k to 2 sts before end of sole kfb k1 => 4 sts increased 28 sts round 2 instep kfb k to 2 sts before end of instep kfb k1 sole kfb k to 2 sts before end
